languages.text: Лучшие умы корабля провели не один цикл, пытаясь понять назначение диковинной призмы, найденной в Комморре. Активировать предмет исследователям повезло лишь однажды — распахнувшись на множество лепестков, призма воссоздала голографическое изображение и координаты Ледяной планеты в системе Пояс Лангренна, после чего захлопнулась вновь.

The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.
languages.original_text: Лучшие умы корабля провели не один цикл, пытаясь понять назначение диковинной призмы, найденной в Комморре. Активировать предмет исследователям повезло лишь однажды — распахнувшись на множество лепестков, призма воссоздала голографическое изображение и координаты Ледяной планеты в системе Пояс Лангренна, после чего захлопнулась вновь.

traits.locale_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

languages.text: 船上最聪明的技术人员花了很多时间，试图弄清楚在科摩罗发现的古怪棱镜真正的用途。技术人员在偶然之下打开了棱镜，棱镜不断旋转、展开，仿佛一排排花瓣一样，展示了朗恩之带某颗冰冷行星的全息图像与坐标，之后便再度关闭。
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

traits.locale_text: 船上最聪明的技术人员花了很多时间，试图弄清楚在科摩罗发现的古怪棱镜真正的用途。技术人员在偶然之下打开了棱镜，棱镜不断旋转、展开，仿佛一排排花瓣一样，展示了朗恩之带某颗冰冷行星的全息图像与坐标，之后便再度关闭。

languages.text: Les plus grands cerveaux du vaisseau ont passé de longues heures à tenter de comprendre à quoi pouvait bien servir l'étrange prisme trouvé sur Commorragh. Sur un coup de chance, les chercheurs sont parvenus à activer l'objet qui s'est alors ouvert comme une fleur pour afficher l'image holographique d'une planète de glace située dans la Ceinture de Langrenn avant de se refermer.
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

traits.locale_text: Les plus grands cerveaux du vaisseau ont passé de longues heures à tenter de comprendre à quoi pouvait bien servir l'étrange prisme trouvé sur Commorragh. Sur un coup de chance, les chercheurs sont parvenus à activer l'objet qui s'est alors ouvert comme une fleur pour afficher l'image holographique d'une planète de glace située dans la Ceinture de Langrenn avant de se refermer.

languages.text: Las mentes más brillantes de la nave han pasado numerosas guardias intentando entender la finalidad del prisma encontrado en Commorragh. Los investigadores solo han logrado activar el objeto una vez. Extendiendo una serie de pétalos, el prisma reprodujo una imagen holográfica y las coordenadas de un mundo helado en el Cinturón de Langrenn antes de cerrarse otra vez.
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

traits.locale_text: Las mentes más brillantes de la nave han pasado numerosas guardias intentando entender la finalidad del prisma encontrado en Commorragh. Los investigadores solo han logrado activar el objeto una vez. Extendiendo una serie de pétalos, el prisma reprodujo una imagen holográfica y las coordenadas de un mundo helado en el Cinturón de Langrenn antes de cerrarse otra vez.

languages.text: 船の最高の頭脳が結集し、コモラフで発見された奇妙なプリズムの用途を調査していた。研究者たちは一度運良くその物体の起動に成功した。プリズムは花びらの中で広がり、ホログラフィック画像とラングレンズベルトにある氷の惑星の座標を再生すると、再び停止した。
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

traits.locale_text: 船の最高の頭脳が結集し、コモラフで発見された奇妙なプリズムの用途を調査していた。研究者たちは一度運良くその物体の起動に成功した。プリズムは花びらの中で広がり、ホログラフィック画像とラングレンズベルトにある氷の惑星の座標を再生すると、再び停止した。

languages.text: Die klügsten Köpfe des Schiffs verbrachten viele Wachschichten mit dem Versuch, den Zweck des bizarren Prismas aus Commorragh zu verstehen. Es gelang den Forschern nur ein einziges Mal durch pures Glück, das Prisma zu aktivieren. Es entfaltete sich wie ein Blütenkelch und reproduzierte das holografische Bild eines Eisplaneten in Langrenns Gürtel, zusammen mit dessen Koordinaten. Dann schloss es sich sofort wieder.
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.

traits.locale_text: Die klügsten Köpfe des Schiffs verbrachten viele Wachschichten mit dem Versuch, den Zweck des bizarren Prismas aus Commorragh zu verstehen. Es gelang den Forschern nur ein einziges Mal durch pures Glück, das Prisma zu aktivieren. Es entfaltete sich wie ein Blütenkelch und reproduzierte das holografische Bild eines Eisplaneten in Langrenns Gürtel, zusammen mit dessen Koordinaten. Dann schloss es sich sofort wieder.

languages.text: Gemideki en parlak zihinler, Commorragh'ta bulunan tuhaf prizmanın amacını anlamak için sayısız nöbet harcadı. Araştırmacıların yalnızca bir keresinde şansı yaver gitti ve objeyi aktifleştirdiler. Yaprak gibi açılan prizma, Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki bir buz gezegeninin hologram görselini ve koordinatlarını açığa çıkardı ve ardından bir kez daha kapandı.
languages.original_text: The ship's finest minds spent many watches trying to understand the purpose of the bizarre prism found in Commorragh. The researchers were lucky to activate the object only once — unfurling in an array of petals, the prism reproduced the holographic image and coordinates of an ice planet in Langrenn's Belt, before snapping shut once more.
